resources.string: Write down three things you are grateful for today.
Take 5 minutes to focus on your breath. Inhale deeply, exhale slowly.
Take a short walk outside. Notice the sights, sounds, and sensations around you.
Repeat daily a positive affirmation to yourself. "I am worthy and deserving of love."
Take a break from screens for an hour. Engage in offline activities.
Connect with a friend or loved one. Share how you are feeling.
Say no to something that drains your energy or causes stress.
Be kind to yourself. Treat yourself with the same kindness you would offer a friend.
Fuel your body with nourishing foods. Eat a balanced meal.
Engage in a creative activity you enjoy, whether it is drawing, writing, or crafting.
Set a drink water reminder. Stay hydrated throughout the day.
Slow down and savor each bite during your next meal.
Move your body in a way that feels good. Take a dance break or go for a walk.
Accept your thoughts and feelings without judgment.
Name five things you can see, four things you can touch, three things you can hear, two things you can smell, and one thing you can taste
Take a walk and notice the beauty around you. Reflect on what you are grateful for.
Practice progressive muscle relaxation. Tense and release each muscle group in your body.
Set boundaries around your screen usage. Schedule screen-free time before bed.
Forgive yourself for past mistakes. Let go of guilt and shame.
Spend time outdoors. Connect with nature and breathe in the fresh air.
Write about a challenge you overcame and what you learned from it
Take a moment to check in with your emotions. How are you feeling right now?
Reach out to someone you have not spoken to in a while. Catch up and reconnect.
Visualize yourself succeeding at a goal or overcoming an obstacle.
Celebrate a small victory or accomplishment, no matter how minor. You deserve recognition for your efforts.
Reflect on three things that went well today before bed.
Set an intention for the day. What do you want to focus on or accomplish?
Practice active listening in your conversations today. Fully focus on the speaker without distractions.
Engage in a self-care activity that nurtures your mind, body, or spirit.
Take a break from news and media outlets. Protect your mental well-being.
